SELECT eqpmn_nm, ocrn_dt, recovery_yn, cd.trobl_nm, eqpmn.eqpmn_lat, eqpmn.eqpmn_lon FROM trobl_ocrn_info trobl JOIN eqpmn_reg_info eqpmn ON trobl.eqpmn_id = eqpmn.eqpmn_id JOIN trobl_cd cd ON trobl.eqpmn_trobl_cd = cd.eqpmn_trobl_cd WHERE eqpmn.use_yn = 'Y' AND DATE(ocrn_dt) = CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY ocrn_dt DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT eqpmn_nm, ocrn_dt, recovery_yn, cd.trobl_nm, eqpmn.eqpmn_lat, eqpmn.eqpmn_lon FROM trobl_ocrn_info trobl JOIN eqpmn_reg_info eqpmn ON trobl.eqpmn_id = eqpmn.eqpmn_id JOIN trobl_cd cd ON trobl.eqpmn_trobl_cd = cd.eqpmn_trobl_cd WHERE eqpmn.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY ocrn_dt DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT ocrn_dt, recovery_yn, recovery_dt, trobl.eqpmn_trobl_cd, trobl.eqpmn_id, eqpmn_nm, trobl_nm FROM trobl_ocrn_info trobl JOIN eqpmn_reg_info eqpmn ON trobl.eqpmn_id = eqpmn.eqpmn_id JOIN trobl_cd cd ON trobl.eqpmn_trobl_cd = cd.eqpmn_trobl_cd WHERE trobl.eqpmn_id = #{eqpmn_id}
